PSCT.Base: Target 1 "@Ignister" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If an "@Ignister" monster(s) you control with 2300 or more ATK would be destroyed by card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. If this card is banished: You can activate this effect; your "@Ignister" monsters with 2300 or more ATK cannot be destroyed by battle this turn. You can only activate "FA.I.ghting Spirit" once per turn.
